title: Get all BRAND-has-car-model Relationships
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to fetch the CAR MODELs that belong to a specific BRAND\
So I can find out which models the BRAND has produced over the time
description:
# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a JSON array containing the following relationship data for each item:
  * `brand_id`: integer
  * `car_model_id`: integer
  * `relationship_id`: integer
  * `relationship_name`: string

**Unhappy path**

* when there are no car models attached an empty array is returned (200)
* 404 when brand does not exist

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* all car model relationships for the specified brand are returned as a list
* an empty list is returned when there are no car models attached to this brand
* an error is returned when the brand could not be found

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
